title: El Clasico Countdown
description:
The FC crew break down the final injury concerns ahead of tomorrow's clash between Real Madrid and Barcelona and question if the Catalan side have the players to pull off the upset in Madrid. Plus, the guys give their predictions for Manchester City's visit to Liverpool and react to Harry Kane's winning penalty vs Everton.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona are heavy underdogs vs Real Madrid on Sunday; Liverpool vs Man City; Kane on the scoresheet for Tottenham
